usp.leadingdesc: 95% of customers rate us 5/5 on TrustPilot
usp.pricedesc: We agree to beat any other 'like for like' offer!
usp.servicedesc: Multilingual Team of Real Sailors and Yacht Charter Experts
usp.destinationdesc: Our Boats are all Insured, registered and certified boats in recognised charter fleets. On request with crew.

simpleSearch.simpleFailure: Please fill out the missing search fields.
simpleSearch.searchRegion: Where Would You Like To Sail?

admin.helpselectcountry: After selecting a country, a new select will appear for area, and then base. If you want the content to appear for just country, leave the next select blank. If you cannot find your location, a page probably already exists, you must edit that.

yachtCharterPage.title: The Top Yacht Charter Destinations Globally
yachtCharterPage.introduction: Take a look at the most popular yacht charter destinations including Croatia, Greece and BVI
yachtCharterPage.noContent: Our team works hard to ensure we have the very best and up to date information for yacht charter in {location}. On this occasion, we're still working to update! In the mean time, why not send us an email with the form below?
yachtCharterPage.topDestinations: Didn't find what you're looking for?
yachtCharterPage.urgency: Hello {name}, {number} people are looking at yachts in {location}, head to our yacht search.

meta.title: Yacht Charter In {location}
meta.description: Take a look at the very best yacht charters in {location}. Read our sailing itineraries and blogs to bring your perfect holiday to life.

page.title: The Best {type}
page.description: Our Yacht Charter consultants work hard creating the very best and up to date {type}

boatPage.title: Charter a {model} in {country}, {location}
boatPage.description: Our {buildyear} classic {modelname} is a perfect {cabins} charter yacht available from {location}, in {country}. You will find she sleeps {berths} comfortably. This yacht is perfect for groups seeking a little more space, with great value.
boatPage.equipmentdesc: Please take your time to look at the equipment available with this charter. All equipment is inclusive of the charter price. Contact our live chat if something is missing!
boatPage.extraspaid: Items marked with * are approximate, our Charter Consultants will negotiate on your behalf!
boatPage.extrasfree: Items marked with ** are included in price for free
boatPage.urgency: Another user is looking at this yacht, you can reserve this yacht for free.

searchPage.cabinsHint: Select the number of cabins you desire
searchPage.recentViews: Viewed {views} times in the past hour.
searchPage.title: Yacht Charters in {title}
searchPage.guide: A Guide To Yacht Charter in {title}
searchPage.moneyoff: Prices direct from operators, with the savings passed on to you.
searchPage.secure: Shop safely with your credit card in your local currency.

MultiBoatCard.adultshint: How many adults will be accompanying you?
MultiBoatCard.childrenhint: How many children will be accompanying you?
MultiBoatCard.name: Your Name
MultiBoatCard.emailhint: We will contact you using this email.

review.snackbar: Thanks {name} for helping us and your fellow SailCheckers choose the best yachts. Our team will shortly moderate and publish your review.
review.noreviews: There are no reviews for this vessel. Be the first to leave a review!
review.title: Reviews

booking.snackbar: Thanks {name} for reserving {boat}, a member of our team will shortly contact you to formalise details.

price.explainrequest: On occasion, prices for a yacht are not available. There are a variety of reasons however, please do let us know if you are interested. We are able to go direct to an operator to find the price, often cheaper than the original!
